data.actual_result: You can only set a program as your game once per instance
data.expected_result: You can set your game to whatever in one instance of the user settings.
data.short_description: When selecting a game from your drop-down of running programs, if you choose one and then un-choose it, you'll have to close user settings and reopen it in order to set your game as that again.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your game to something - Remove it - Check the drop-down menu to see if its there - close and re-open the user settings page.
